description: Automating Academic Illustration For AI Scientists
modifies-existing-images-based-on-text-i: Modifies existing images based on text instructions using AI-powered editing capabilities.
url-of-the-source-image-to-edit-must-be-: URL of the source image to edit. Must be a valid URI pointing to an accessible image file.
text-instructions-describing-the-desired: Text instructions describing the desired edits. Specify changes, additions, or modifications to apply.
output-image-aspect-ratio-options-range-: Output image aspect ratio. Options range from ultrawide (21:9) to portrait (9:16). Default is 3:2.
output-resolution-quality-1k-standard-2k: Output resolution quality. 1K (standard), 2K (high), or 4K (ultra-high). Default is 1K.
url-of-the-edited-image-points-to-the-mo: URL of the edited image. Points to the modified image file with applied changes.
translates-research-content-into-detaile: Translates research content into detailed visual prompts using in-context learning from reference diagrams.
research-method-or-scientific-content-to: Research method or scientific content to be illustrated. Accepts detailed text describing mechanisms, processes, or findings.
optional-title-or-caption-for-the-illust: Optional title or caption for the illustration. Provides context for visual intent.
optional-array-of-reference-objects-from: Optional array of reference objects from retriever. Each contains id, visual_intent, content, and path_to_gt_image for in-context learning.
generated-detailed-prompt-for-image-visu: Generated detailed prompt for image visualization. Contains comprehensive visual description based on content and references.
array-of-reference-image-urls-extracted-: Array of reference image URLs extracted from references. Used as visual examples for downstream generation.
searches-curated-diagram-collection-to-f: Searches curated diagram collection to find visually similar references for guiding illustration generation.
research-content-or-method-description-t: Research content or method description to find relevant reference diagrams for. Supports detailed scientific text.
optional-caption-providing-additional-co: Optional caption providing additional context for retrieval. Helps narrow down visual intent matching.
array-of-matched-reference-objects-each-: Array of matched reference objects. Each contains id (unique identifier), visual_intent (diagram type), content (description), and path_to_gt_image (image path).
generates-scientific-illustrations-from-: Generates scientific illustrations from text prompts using state-of-the-art image generation models.
detailed-text-description-of-the-image-t: Detailed text description of the image to generate. Should include visual elements, layout, style, and scientific details.
optional-array-of-reference-image-urls-f: Optional array of reference image URLs for style guidance. Helps maintain visual consistency with existing diagrams.
url-of-the-generated-image-points-to-the: URL of the generated image. Points to the newly created illustration based on the prompt.
end-to-end-academic-illustration-pipelin: retrieves references, plans visual layout, and generates publication-ready diagrams.
research-content-or-method-description-t: Research content or method description to illustrate. Required input that drives the entire generation pipeline. Should contain scientific mechanisms, processes, or findings.
optional-title-or-caption-providing-cont: Optional title or caption providing context. Passed to retriever and planner for better visual intent matching.
url-of-the-final-generated-academic-illu: URL of the final generated academic illustration. Output from the visualize node after the complete pipeline execution.
